title: 1000th win
body:
I'm currently on 999 Normal wins and was wondering if it was possible to play with a Riot member for my 1000th win. 
What better time than Oceans week to go for that 1000th win.

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'd have better luck with this being posted in [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), but i'll send a message off and see if i cant get some people into this for ya.
